title: Popilush Corset Shapewear Dress Faux Leather Club Midi Dress V Neck Night Out Bodycon Dresses for Women
description: SIZE CHART AND CLEANING TIPS: If your size information falls between two sizes, please choose the larger size, if you want a looser fit, PLEASE SIZE UP, to enjoy our tummy control dress for a long time we recommend the hand wash, no ironing and no bleaching
